text: Moneylion is an honest and straight forward service. Their customer service is helpful and understanding. The instacash may take time to grow, but they make it easy and clear about how much you're getting and why. The credit builder plus loan is easy to quality for. Again, they make it clear why you qualify for what you do. I highly recommend Moneylion.
title: They Do What They Claim

text: Money Lion is fake asf! The people who work for them are rude as hell, they laugh at you like what you going through is funny! They hang up in your face and end chats before you even get to explain anything! When you ask to speak to a supervisor it’s like you asking them to do a whole lot and it’s too much for them and try every way possible to get you to hang up what I mean by that is they put you on hold with this annoying ass sound for hours! These people put a hold of $570.75 of my money because I tryed to make a reservation for a car that only cost $465.60 by the way. The transaction declined so my money should still be in my account! There shouldn’t be no kind of hold to any on my money that I had in my account! Came to Georgia for my grandmothers funeral with my 6 children that I’m raising by myself and got stranded! I live In New Orleans, and my kids are missing a lot of school because of this! They don’t care because they not the ones it’s being done to so it’s funny to them! I was suppose to leave 09/22/20 and I’m stuck in Georgia with no money, no where to go, and can’t put my kids in school!
title: Y’all deserve no stars at all!!

text: Absolutely love this app. When I’m in a bind until payday I use MoneyLion. It’s instant for a small fee or for free you can wait a few days. It’s been very helpful so far and I always tip. Definitely recommended.
